Why don't you try doing some more morning exercises?

What I mean is, try mixing it up. Try doing push ups one day, Jogging another day, and ETC.

Its something to do at least!

"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d543b963687220f3bb1500#post_54d543b963687220f3bb1500
What's _your_ problem? You're always so negative, even about yourself.
Think about what you _can_ do instead of what you can't. Then go from there.
Maybe look for Skype buddies with someone.

I just really don't want to leave you guys alone. (I think that's actually the root of nearly all of my major problems these days.)
